content:
https://rfcbot.rs does not load and @rfcbot is not responsive to an fcp command (https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/87467#issuecomment-932849991). I assume these are related.

Screenshot-from-2021-10-02-22-21-09.png

Oct 02 18:47:59 rfcbot-rs app/web.1 thread 'main' panicked at 'couldn't update the configuration!: Reqwest(Error(Hyper(Error(Connect, Custom { kind: Other, error: Ssl(Error { code: ErrorCode(1), cause: Some(Ssl(ErrorStack([Error { code: 336134278, library: "SSL routines", function: "ssl3_get_server_certificate", reason: "certificate verify failed", file: "s3_clnt.c", line: 1269 }]))) }, X509VerifyResult { code: 10, error: "certificate has expired" }) })), "https://team-api.infra.rust-lang.org/v1/rfcbot.json"))', src/teams.rs:149:21
my guess is it needs a redeploy to pick up new ssl certs
Thanks, both web UI and fcp command are working now. :)
yeah looks like it hadn't been deployed in a little over a year
